function.note: Bioconductor package. It provides graph objects from pathway topology derived from Biocarta, HumanCyc, KEGG, NCI, Panther, Reactome and SPIKE databases. Dedicated functions are provided to run topological pathway analysis on these graph.

summary.description: Package able to gather and make easily available the contents of the four major pathway databases. In the field of topological analysis graphite acts as a provider of biological information by reducing the pathway complexity considering the biological meaning of the pathway elements.
summary.name: graphite
